sentences.en: &B{the story goes that} he's fallen out with his friends.
sentences.cn: 据说他跟他的朋友们闹翻了。

sentences.en: a book of short stories
sentences.cn: 短篇小说集

sentences.en: According to the prosecution, the officers manufactured an elaborate story.
sentences.cn: 根据控方意见，官员们精心编造了事情经过。

sentences.en: As 1999 draws to a close, the story is changing.
sentences.cn: 1999年即将结束时，情况有了变化。

sentences.en: Don's story unfolded as the cruise got under way.
sentences.cn: 随着航行的开始，唐的故事也随之展开。

sentences.en: Don’t be frightened – it’s only a story (= it is imaginary ) .
sentences.cn: 别害怕，这只是一个故事。

sentences.en: Every line etched on her face told a story of personal anguish.
sentences.cn: 她脸上的每条皱纹都讲述了一次痛苦的经历。

sentences.en: I too found this story a little hard to swallow.
sentences.cn: 我也觉得这件事有点难以置信。

sentences.en: In my version of the story, I added some new material.
sentences.cn: 我在讲述这个故事时加入了新的素材。

sentences.en: Local news organizations are being criticized for sensationalizing the story.
sentences.cn: 当地的新闻机构因为对此事大肆渲染而备受指责。

sentences.en: Lucilla often asks her sisters to retell the story.
sentences.cn: 露西拉经常要姐姐们把这个故事反复讲给她听。

sentences.en: Men don't cry in public. End of story.
sentences.cn: 男人不会在公共场合哭泣。就是这样。

sentences.en: Robinson didn't think the story was so far off the mark.
sentences.cn: 鲁宾逊认为这个报道根本算不上离谱。

sentences.en: Sharon tells the story of that night with self-deprecating humour.
sentences.cn: 沙伦以幽默自嘲的口吻讲述那一夜的故事。

sentences.en: The evidence of our eyes tells us a different story.
sentences.cn: 我们亲眼所见的可不是那么一回事。

sentences.en: The film was based on a true story .
sentences.cn: 这部影片是根据真实故事改编的。

sentences.en: The idea for the story came to him in a daydream.
sentences.cn: 这个故事的念头是他做白日梦的时候突然想到的。

sentences.en: The story of King Arthur became part of oral tradition.
sentences.cn: 亚瑟王的故事成为口头传说的一部分。

sentences.en: The story starts back in 1950, when I was five.
sentences.cn: 故事可以追溯到1950年，那时我才5岁。

sentences.en: The town of whitby was immortalised in Bram Stoker's famous Dracula story.
sentences.cn: 惠特比镇因为布拉姆·斯托克著名的吸血鬼故事而名传后世。

sentences.en: to cut a long story short, I married Stephen.
sentences.cn: 长话短说，我和斯蒂芬结婚了。

sentences.en: United kept on trying but it was the same old sotry—no luck.
sentences.cn: 虽然联队一直在努力，但还是老样子，运气不佳。

sentences.en: We cuddled together over a bedtime story .
sentences.cn: 我们依偎在一起看睡前故事。
